title: feat(social): Add automatic crossposting for Discord real-time and weekly announcements
author: MeatyChunks

gist.headline: The megaphone gets louder
gist.blurb: Updated our Discord bots to automatically crosspost announcements. Now the buzz reaches further, faster.
gist.summary: Modified Discord publishing scripts to automatically crosspost messages to follower channels using bot authentication.
gist.impact: Announcements will immediately appear in external servers that follow our channels, removing manual steps.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot operating a cozy retro radio station. Broadcasting vibes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot speaking into a retro microphone at a tiny radio station desk. On Air sign glows lime green (#ecf874). Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
